revised_title: Exploring the Voltage Dependence of Inactivation in Sodium Channels of Squid Giant Axon
tldr: The author investigates the voltage dependence of inactivation in sodium channels of the squid giant axon. They propose a modified series-parallel model of the sodium channel to explain the disagreement between macroscopic and single-channel studies. The study concludes that the inactivation gate carries around 1.3 units of electronic charge and discusses the implications for voltage-gated ion channel models.
